## Question 1

What is $x^2$ when $x$ is 9?

1. 89
2. 90
3. 99
4. _81_

*** .hint What is $9 times 9$?

*** .explanation When $x$ is 9, $x^2$ is $9^2$, which is $9 times 9$.
